div.head: MOspace Institutional Repository
div.p: The MOspace Institutional Repository is an online repository for creative and scholarly works and other resources created by faculty, students, and staff at the University of Missouri--Columbia and the University of Missouri--Kansas City. MOspace makes these resources freely available on the web and assures their preservation for the future.

p.hi: Additional University of Missouri Online Library Repositories
